name: 許益瑞
objective: This course will introduce the modern inorganic chemistry to give students the basic concepts on the structure symmetry, chemical bonding and spectra. The course will start from quantum theory of atomic structure, and then discuss with the chemical bonding in molecules, molecular orbitals, coordination chemistry and solid state structures.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
Week 2 Atomic structure 
Week 3 Simple Bonding Theory
Week 4 Symmetry and Group Theory (I)
Week 5 Symmetry and Group Theory (II)
Week 6 Molecular Orbitals (I)
Week 7 Molecular Orbitals (II)
Week 8 The Crystalline Solid State
Week 9 Midterm
Week 10 Coordination Chemistry I : Structures and Isomers
Week 11 Coordination Chemistry I : Structures and Isomers
Week 12 Coordination Chemistry II : Bonding
Week 13 Coordination Chemistry II : Bonding
Week 14 Coordination Chemistry III : Electronic spectra
Week 15 Coordination Chemistry III : Electronic spectra
Week 16 Coordination Chemistry IV : Reactions and Mechanisms
Week 17 Coordination Chemistry IV : Reactions and Mechanisms
Week 18 Final Exam.
materials: Gary . Miessler and Donald A. Tarr, Inorganic Chemistry, 4th ed.

name: 蔡福裕
objective:
無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、
過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅
schedule:
第10-11週: Coordination Chemistry I: Structures and Isomers
第12-13週: Coordination Chemistry II: Bondung
第14-15週: Coordination Chemistry III: Reactions and Mechanisms
第16-17週: Organometallic Chemistry
第18週: 期末考
materials:
Inorganic Chemistry
Gary L. Miessler and Donald A. Tarr
4th Ed
